java.lang.Object

com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.PHSDKListener
public class PhilipsBridgeUPnPFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.PHSDKListener

This class is design to find with UPnP discovery protocol the Philips bridge for HUE light
